Question: This person said he wrote "I'm Down" as a vehicle for his Little Richard impersonation.
Hints: In September 1989, they launched the ____ World Tour, his first in over a decade.
Sir James ****, MBE (born 18 June 1942) is an English musician, singer, songwriter, multi-instrumentalist and composer.
On the eve of the 2012 U.S Presidential Election, this person issued a video endorsement of President Barack Obama.
